title: jagadIshA bhuvi tanil (g)
sahitya:
jagadIshA bhuvi tanil (g).  rAgA:  nATa.  dhruva tALA.


1:  jagadIshA bhuvi tanil un tiru malaraDi tozha enakkaruL tA
ati unnata nirantara poruLE anbAlE aDiyavar manamagizh
diDha miga varu aruLE mA tuyar tiru bhuvi tanil varubava
iruL keDa oLi taru navamaNi tiraLE
 caraNam 2    mOkSAnanda padam peTriDa mutti vazhiyil manadODu naDattiDa
pean tA vA aruL karanena varu atishaya paran unadaDi paNindEn
 caraNam 3    bhAva nAshan enbOnE undanin padam paNindEnE tiruvAcaka
paDi unadaDi vara muzhu manadODu tavittiDum aDiyArgaL
magizh pera tirukkaram pera bhUmiyil kA vA
